page.title: 07 HOUSING
page.content: There are two types of housing in this area,council houses and private houses.The council homes are on two estates,Douglas and Whitfield.Douglas was built in the early 1950's.There are tenements and semi_detached houses in Douglas.Whitfield was built in the late 1960's.The houses are a Swedish design called Skarne blocks.From the air the houses are shaped in a hexagon with drying areas in the middle.This is not a good idea because of vandalism.To make the houses more private and less open,they are being alterted.Houses are being built by Barratt,Baird and Bett companies in the private sector.
